summary: A docile black law student is possessed by a 1940's mobster in mid 1970s New Orleans, Louisiana. The mobster seeks revenge upon the people who killed him and his sister.
cast: Glynn Turman|Louis Gossett Jr.|Joan Pringle|Carl W. Crudup|Julian Christopher|Fred Pinkard|Jo Anne Meredith|Alice Jubert|David McKnight|Stephanie Faulkner|Fuddle Bagley|Earl Billings|Paul Galloway|Barbara Tasker|Tom Alden|Melvin Bijou Jr.|Blue Lu Barker|Joseph Collins|Fred Ford|Chauncey Leon Gilbert|Ruth Kempf|Bob Minor|Tony Owens|Samuel 'Catfish' Routh|Hazel Roberts|Timothy Toseborough|Rhonda Shear|Danny Dunn|Vernel Bagneris|Adolph Caesar|Deonna Lang
title: J.D.'s Revenge
